description: Cafes and restaurants may also be allowed to operate outdoor areas, the Manx chief minister said.
title: Coronavirus: Lifestyle businesses to reopen from 1 June
title_page: Coronavirus: Lifestyle businesses to reopen from 1 June - BBC News
maintext: An expansion of the repatriation scheme was also announced and, from 3 June, there will be two weekly sailings from Heysham with the maximum number of passengers allowed on each increased to 50.
